markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Shooting Star](/Spells.aspx?ID=1042)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 143 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Requirements** You're wielding a ranged weapon or a thrown weapon.
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You let loose a projectile that flies true and leaves the blazing trail of a meteor behind it. Make a ranged Strike, ignoring the target's [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) and reducing the target's [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459) by one degree for this Strike only (greater to standard, standard to lesser, and lesser to none). If the Strike hits, the meteor trail hangs in the air. This gives the benefits of concealment negation and cover reduction to any attacks made against the creature (by anyone) until the start of your next turn.
name: Shooting Star
requirement: You're wielding a ranged weapon or a thrown weapon.
requirement_markdown: You're wielding a ranged weapon or a thrown weapon.

text: Shooting Star Source Secrets of Magic pg. 143 1.1 Cast Single Action verbal Requirements You're wielding a ranged weapon or a thrown weapon. --- You let loose a projectile that flies true and leaves the blazing trail of a meteor behind it. Make a ranged Strike, ignoring the target's concealment and reducing the target's cover by one degree for this Strike only (greater to standard, standard to lesser, and lesser to none). If the Strike hits, the meteor trail hangs in the air. This gives the benefits of concealment negation and cover reduction to any attacks made against the creature (by anyone) until the start of your next turn.
